column1: Harding was a man of Rohan during the War of the Ring.
Harding fought and died in the Battle of the Pelennor Fields. His name is remembered in the poem Song of the Mounds of Mundburg.
2012: The Lord of the Rings Online: Riders of Rohan:

column2: overseeing the Wold and the Eastemnet. He dwells in the village of Harwick
column3: the main settlement of the Wold.
